DOC.criteria: 1. patient Aged 18 45 year . 2. singleton viable pregnancy . 3. non scar uterus . 1. systemic illness ( DM , Hypertension , renal disease , liver disease , sickle cell disease ) 2. know congenital fetal anomaly . 3. multiple pregnancy . 4. intra uterine fetal death . 5. anatomical defect pregnant uterus 6. abnormally locate placenta placental anomaly 7. morbid obesity 8. missing record 9. unwilling incorporate study .
